History

0.1.0 (2018-06-20)
------------------

* First release on PyPI.

0.2.0 (2018-06-23)
------------------

* Look for ``layers.yaml`` in current working directory.

0.3.0 (2018-06-24)
------------------

* Rename command to ``layer-lint``.
* Changed order of layers in ``layers.yaml`` to be listed high level to low level.
